summary: Branding was updated in the HTML title and in-app header, tiger decal images were added to the hero section, and a new optional soundtrack control with persisted local preferences was implemented. However, the diff does not show footer branding updates, nor does it include the required static asset files (tiger images and the MP3) referenced by the new UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update footer branding text (copyright line) to show “Barrera Healthy Eats” and remove remaining user-visible “HealthyEats” occurrences.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the header branding updated and the document title updated, but the App.tsx content is truncated before the footer and other UI areas, so there is no evidence the footer text or all other user-visible occurrences were updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Serve tiger decorative images as static frontend assets (generated images) from the frontend public assets path.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references tiger decal PNGs, but the diff does not include any added static image asset files, so there is no evidence the images actually exist in the frontend assets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Serve the soundtrack audio file as a static frontend asset.
missing_requirements.reason: SoundtrackControls references an MP3 under /assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3, but the diff does not include adding that audio file (or any assets folder changes), so there is no evidence the audio asset exists.
